name: The Silent Weeper
description:
After his father's reign was ended with an act of rebellion, a banished prince with an oath to never speak again until he reclaims his throne, stumbles upon the house of an ancient wizard.

This is a fantasy adventure/platforming game with light puzzle elements. This is more of a "playable teaser" than a demo, I already made most of the mechanics and so I put a little bit of display for each of them. 

I've done all of the programming except for the portal "view", which I owe to Sebastian Lague on Youtube. I've also done all of the modelling/texturing etc. Here are the artists on FreeSound whose work I've used:

martats, innorecords, klankbeeld, szegvari, BloodPixelHero, platmonkey, tairaKomori, yap, brendan89, fission9, drowsyprincess, sturmankin, samulis.

Early demo.
